++ Writing A Design Document


Additional comments:



Remember:
  Overview:  A general introduction to the project from the user point of view.  Think of your audience as a high level manager.
  
  Requirements:  The “must do” list at a high level.  Think of your audience as a middle level manager and fellow engineers.
  
  Design proposal:  The “how the project will fullfill the requirements” section.  Think of your audience as a middle level manager and fellow engineers.
  
  Design Details: The “nitty gritty details>  Think of your audience as your fellow engineers.
